title: Accessibility Statement
commitmentText: TwelfthKey Consulting is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.
wcagDescription: We aim to meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards, including:
wcag1: Color contrast ratios of at least 4.5:1
feedbackText: If you encounter accessibility barriers, please contact us at:
